chapters.title: Chapter 3: A Dangerous Place
chapters.info: Dobser, p. 124—Known drunkard in the Black Tower. Taim has beaten him senseless a number of times for getting into the wine. He has been Turned to the Shadow, but is still a drunkard. He tried to pilfer the wine that Androl told him Leish had left sitting out, though that was of course a ruse to lure him into an ambush.
